name: Leonardo Hotel & Residence Munich

reviews.text: I was travelling on a budget and could not afford centrally located hotels, so I chose this one.
reviews.title: Nice surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is really good, very quite part of the city, just 1 block from metro station that takes you to the city center!
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly receptionists checked me in and were able to allocate a new room for me when I asked for a higher floor.
reviews.title: Munchen Magic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a nice surprise it turned out there is also a small kitchenette in the room with micro, fridge, sink, very helpful!
reviews.title: A beautiful stay

reviews.text: Room was big enough, but the bathroom was really tiny. All in excellent condition and very clean!
reviews.title: Pay Money To Be Treated Like Crap By The Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel provided us with everything we needed for a long weekend in munich visiting the Christmas markets! Our room was clean and pleasant. The hotel is extremely near a station on the U2 tube line, which is about 5 stops from the centre. Set in a very quiet, though bland, residential area. Good value for money - we took advantage a 3 nights for 2 offer. Our only criticism is that the hotel lacked character, but it did the job!
reviews.title: Ger-many good points!

reviews.text: I booked this hotel as I was on a tight budget for this short trip, with expedia I got a third night free.
reviews.title: Great value in Giesing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I arrived I was very pleasently surpirsed by the quality of the accommodation. The room was a reasonable size and spotless. It contained satalite TV, trouser press, mini bar, phone, safe and there
reviews.title: Wish I knew a place like this everywhere

likes.liked: — Convenient to major sights while quiet and relaxing

reviews.text: was ample wardrobe space. There was also a really nice little balcony.
reviews.title: Loved the Apart in geising

reviews.text: The staff were great, very friendly and efficient.
reviews.title: Don't go there!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great base for exploring Munich

reviews.text: Only 5 stops on U-Bahn to city centre- trains every 10 minutes- although drops to every 20 on Sundays.
reviews.title: Enjoyed the stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very friendly staff (Lindt easter rabbit in room on Easter Sunday a nice touch).
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay

reviews.text: Bit of a crush for breakfast.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A single room was booked from [---].
reviews.title: Great place to stay

description: Only several stops on the underground into the city centre or the Fairground and convention centre. Leonardo Hotel & Residenz Munich has a central yet tranquil location, making it a home-away-from-home not only for Munich fans, but especially for long-term guests. Whether you are here for business or leasure, you will feel at home with us.
